panels.description: As a percentage of the fill line. Values below zero are at serious risk of damaging the pump
panels.title: Pump Resevoir Historical Trend

targets.query: SELECT last("water_temp"), "/^$towerName$/" FROM "TowerData" WHERE ("towerGroup" =~ /^$towerGroup$/ AND "towerName" =~ /^$towerName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "towerName" fill(previous)

SELECT "towerName" as "Tower Name", "towerGroup" as "Tower Group", "air_humidity" as "Air Humidity", "air_temp" as "Air Temp",  "water_temp" as "Water Temp", "flow_status" as "Flow Status", "light_status_1" as "Light Status 1", "light_status_2" as "Light Status 2", "light_status_3" as "Light Status 3", "light_status_4" as "Light Status 4", "pH" as "pH", "water_level" as "Water Level" FROM "TowerData" WHERE ("towerGroup" =~ /^$towerGroup$/ AND "towerName" =~ /^$towerName$/) AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC

list.name: towerGroup
list.query: show tag values on "gf" with key = "towerGroup"

list.name: towerName
list.query: show tag values on "gf" with key = "towerName"
